titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the Della L. Hanville Scrapbook
1932-1933, 1980
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Zoie Clark
titlestmt.sponsor: Sponsored by a grant from the National Historical Publications and Records Commission

publicationstmt.publisher: George Fox University/Northwest Yearly Meeting of Friends Church Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-01-09
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

repository.corpname: George Fox University, Northwest Yearly Meeting of Friends Church Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists of one scrapbook documenting Pacific College, Newberg, Oregon from 1932 to 1933.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Della L. Hanville graduated from Pacific College, Newberg, Oregon, in 1933.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of one scrapbook containing black and white photographs, newspaper clippings, programs, and related items documenting the school's campus and student activities. There is also a 50th reunion schedule of events (May 30, 1980) and one issue of The Crescent (June 20, 1933).
